infotexts.entitydescription.WorkerHardhat: A cheap, light, but sturdy hardhat for construction workers and miners. Does a great job preventing blunt force trauma
infotexts.entitydescription.ForemanHardhat: A cheap, light, but sturdy hardhat for construction workers and miners. Does a great job preventing blunt force trauma. Is identical to the worker hardhat, the only difference is the color
